application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: It is noted that the level monitoring is old data, concluded only in December 2020. The tree service would require a fresh report covering at least 12 months of monitoring until the present. | Trees at present are providing greater benefits by suppressing traffic noise and reducing effects of pollution from North Circular Road within 15 metres of the building.
description:
T2 Ash- reduce crown by 70-90% of crown volume
T3 Ash - reduce crown by 70-90% of crown volume
TG1 Ash & TPO TPO/2019/1111 Sycamore -reduce crown by 70-90% of crown volume
